text: The only place for Fish hotpot! The flavorful broth is refillable. The cze char dishes are of a high standard and consistently good and the price is reasonable. Truly my neighborhood gem! I would suggest to make a reservation as they can get busy especially weekends and rainy days!

Ordered the small grouper steamboat. Came with a generous serving of fresh fish, yam, veg and delicious soup. The fish roe came separate, crunchy and fresh. Dip everything into the delicious garlic chili sauce ðŸ˜‹

Craving for a hearty and flavorful steamboat experience? Whampoa Keng's fish head steamboat here is a must-try. The fish is always incredibly fresh, and the thick, savory soup adds so much depth to each bite. The prawn rolls are a standout â€“ consistently yummy, packed with flavor. As for the cereal prawns, while they're decent, they don't quite compare to the other dishes. Iâ€™ve brought many of my overseas friends here, and every time, they leave satisfied. Even my daughter loves the steamboat, making it a perfect spot for family meals. It's always a delight!
Our go-to place for fish head steamboat. The broth was just right. It is less the heavy chinese wine taste. The hae chor is packed with flavour and water chestnut! love it!
